subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan and what is the state emblem of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और राजस्थान की राजधानी वर्ग के मूल्य किसे प्रस्तुति होती है।

options.explanation_en: The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur, and under the emblem of Rajasthan's capital category, the main symbol is a Lion Capital of Ashoka.
options.explanation_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी होती है जयपुर, और राजस्थान के राजधानी वर्ग के मूलकार को क्या छिपना होता है।

options.explanation_en: Amber Fort is a famous landmark in Jaipur. The main symbol under the Jaipur's capital category is the Peacock.
Mehrangarh Fort is located in Jodhpur. The central symbol under the Jaipur's capital category is the Elephant.
Sanganer is a small town known for its handicrafts. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Elephant.
Udaipur is the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The symbol under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Peacock.
Jaisalmer was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Lion.
Jodhpur was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Elephant.
Alwar was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Leopard.
Sawai Maan was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Tiger.
Jaisalmer was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Elephant.
Kishangarh was the capital of Rajasthan till 1818 AD. The emblem under the Jaipur's capital category is the Royal Tiger.
